mods.abstract: Two color window card (purple and red on white) announcing Tootsie's Orchid Lounge 50th Anniversary with Kris Kristofferson, Randy House, Colt Ford, Mel Tillis, Many Barnett, Terri Clark, Dean Miller, the Rascals, Mark Chesnutt, Jo Anna Smith, Ronnie McDowell, and Little Jimmy Dickens at the Ryman Auditorium on November 7.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
